errors.2: Incorrect order code entered. Check the code again.
errors.3: Confirm that you are not a robot.

orderState.title: Order state
orderState.steamUrlInfo1: 1. You can enter a quick invite link or a friend code to your Steam account, in which case the deal will go faster. You can find it in the Steam tabs: "Friends" > "Add as Friend"
orderState.steamUrlInfo2: 2. You can enter a link to your Steam profile, for this you need to open your profile, right-click on the free field in the profile, then click "copy link address" in the drop-down list
orderState.linkIncorrectErr: Invalid profile link entered. Check again.
orderState.requestSentInfo: You have been sent a request to add friends on Steam. You need to accept our bot with the nickname {{botName}} as a friend. Then the purchased item will be sent to you.

dlc.info: This product is an addition to the main game. Without the presence of the main game, you will not be able to activate the DLC

timer.title: Time to activate
timer.expInfoTooltip: After this time, the order will be impossible to receive. Either an additional payment will be required, or any conditions of the order will change, perhaps now this product is on sale.

activationTimeExpires.message: Unfortunately, you did not manage to get the game before the end of discounts (sales) for this game and your order became inactive. Please contact the seller to resolve this issue.

invitationRefused.youRefused: You have rejected the application of our bot!
invitationRefused.info: You can specify a different profile, try to send a request with our system from another bot, or add the {{- botName}} bot yourself.

tempInviteBan.youRefused: This bot can not send you invites anymore!
tempInviteBan.info: You can specify a different profile, try to send a request with our system from another bot, or add the {{- botName}} bot yourself.

invitationRefusedWithRemoteBot.info: You need to either request a new request from another bot, or you can provide a new link to the account where your order needs to be delivered.

gameExists.info: You already have this game/add-on on your Steam account. Specify another account that does not contain this product. If you have a free (temporary) version of the game, delete it {{- link}} and try again!

gameSendInProgress.title: The game is sent
gameSendInProgress.info1: The game is being sent, please wait...
gameSendInProgress.info2: The procedure usually takes about 3 minutes...

gameSended.title: A good buy
gameSended.info: Thank you for shopping in our store! We would love to hear from you, please contact us again!

gameInQueue.info1: At the moment, all bots of this heading are occupied. Your turn:
gameInQueue.info3: You can contact the seller to clarify the possibility of speeding up the waiting time...

regionError.info: The region of the recipient of the game is different from the one purchased. It is impossible to deliver a game to a region where the game is more expensive than the cost of the selected region. Please specify another account with the correct region, or contact us to resolve the issue!

orderClosed.message: Unfortunately, this order was closed by the seller. Contact for details about this

error.info: There was an unexpected tech. error. Please contact the seller
